mapper.insert: insert into attendance values (ATTENDANCE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, systimestamp, null, default, #{emp_code})
insert into attendance values (ATTENDANCE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, systimestamp, null, 'out', #{emp_code})
mapper.select: select start_time from attendance where to_char(start_time, 'YYYYMMDD') = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') and emp_code = #{emp_code}
select end_time from attendance where to_char(start_time, 'YYYYMMDD') = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') and emp_code = #{emp_code}
mapper.update: update attendance set end_time = systimestamp where to_char(start_time, 'YYYYMMDD') = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') and emp_code = #{emp_code}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ATTENDANCE where start_time between NEXT_DAY(SYSDATE-8,'일요일') and NEXT_DAY(SYSDATE,'토요일') and emp_code=#{emp_code} and start_time is not null
SELECT * FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE to_char(start_time,'YYMMDD') between TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') and LAST_DAY(SYSDATE) and emp_code=#{emp_code} and end_time is not null
SELECT * from attendance where to_char(start_time,'YYMMDD') = to_char(sysdate,'YYMMDD') and emp_code=#{emp_code}
SELECT to_char(start_time,'HH24:MM:SS') from attendance where to_char(start_time,'YYMMDD')=to_char(sysdate,'YYMMDD') and start_time is not null and emp_code=#{emp_code}
SELECT to_char(end_time,'HH24:MM:SS') from attendance where to_char(start_time,'YYMMDD')=to_char(sysdate,'YYMMDD') and end_time is not null and emp_code=#{emp_code}

choose.when: update attendance set start_time=systimestamp, status='IN' where emp_code=#{emp_code} and to_char(today,'YYMMDD') = to_char(sysdate,'YYMMDD')
update attendance set start_time=systimestamp, status='LATE' where emp_code=#{emp_code} and to_char(today,'YYMMDD') = to_char(sysdate,'YYMMDD')
choose.otherwise: update attendance set start_time=systimestamp, status='OUT' where emp_code=#{emp_code} and to_char(today,'YYMMDD') = to_char(sysdate,'YYMMDD')

mapper.update: update attendance set start_time=sysdate where emp_code=#{emp_code} and to_char(start_time,'YYMMDD') = to_char(sysdate,'YYMMDD')
update attendance set end_time=sysdate, overtime=#{overtime} where emp_code=#{emp_code} and to_char(start_time,'YYMMDD') = to_char(sysdate,'YYMMDD')
mapper.select: SELECT to_char(A.today,'YY-MM-DD') today,req.* FROM ATDCHANGEREQ req INNER JOIN ATTENDANCE A ON A.SEQ= req.atd_seq WHERE req.ATD_SEQ=#{atd_seq}

select * from (select A.seq,nvl(to_char(A.start_time,'HH24:MM:SS'),'출근 누락') sub_start_time,nvl(to_char(A.end_time,'HH24:MM:SS'),'퇴근 누락') sub_end_time,to_char(A.today,'YY-MM-DD DY') today, case A.STATUS when 'BW' then '출근 전' when 'IN' then '정상 출근' when 'OUT' then '외근' when 'LATE' then '지각' when 'ABS' then '결근' end as status,case REQ.STATUS when 'C' then '승인' when 'NC' then '검토중' when 'N' then '미승인' else '-' END AS REQ_STATUS, nvl(REQ.comments,'-') as comments FROM ATTENDANCE A FULL OUTER JOIN ATDCHANGEREQ REQ ON A.SEQ=REQ.ATD_SEQ WHERE a.emp_code=#{emp_code} ORDER BY A.SEQ DESC) where ROWNUM <= #{number}

select * from (select A.seq,nvl(to_char(A.start_time,'HH24:MM:SS'),'출근 누락') sub_start_time,nvl(to_char(A.end_time,'HH24:MM:SS'),'퇴근 누락') sub_end_time,to_char(A.today,'YY-MM-DD DY') today, case A.STATUS when 'BW' then '출근 전' when 'IN' then '정상 출근' when 'OUT' then '외근' when 'LATE' then '지각' when 'ABS' then '결근'end as status,case REQ.STATUS when 'C' then '승인' when 'NC' then '검토중' when 'N' then '미승인' else '-' END AS REQ_STATUS, nvl(req.comments,'-') as comments FROM ATTENDANCE A FULL OUTER JOIN ATDCHANGEREQ REQ ON A.SEQ=REQ.ATD_SEQ WHERE a.emp_code=#{emp_code} and a.start_time BETWEEN #{start_time} and '${end_time}' and A.STATUS like '%${search}%' ORDER BY A.SEQ DESC) where ROWNUM <= #{number}
select COUNT(*) from attendance where status='LATE' and emp_code=#{emp_code} and start_time BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') and LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)
select COUNT(*) from attendance where emp_code=#{emp_code} and start_time BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') and LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)
select SUM(EXTRACT(Hour From(end_time-start_time))) hour from attendance where emp_code=#{emp_code} and start_time BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') and LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)
select SUM(EXTRACT(MINUTE From(end_time-start_time))) MINUTE from attendance where emp_code=#{emp_code}and start_time BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') and LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)

SELECT * from (select to_char(A.today,'YY-MM-DD') today, case A.STATUS when 'BW' then '출근 전' when 'IN' then '정상 출근' when 'OUT' then '외근' when 'LATE' then '지각' when 'ABS' then '결근' end as atd_status, req.atd_seq,nvl(req.contents,'-') as contents,case REQ.STATUS when 'C' then '승인' when 'NC' then '검토중' when 'N' then '미승인' else '-' END AS STATUS from attendance a inner join atdchangereq req on req.atd_seq = a.seq where a.emp_code=#{emp_code} order by today desc) where rownum <= 5
mapper.update: update atdchangereq set start_time=to_timestamp('${today} ${start_time}','YY-MM-DD HH24mi'), end_time=to_timestamp('${today} ${end_time}','YY-MM-DD HH24mi'),contents=#{contents} where atd_seq=#{atd_seq}
mapper.select: select req.seq,to_char(req.start_time,'YY-MM-DD (DY)') today,to_char(req.start_time,'HH24:MM') start_time, to_char(req.end_time,'HH24:MM') end_time,req.contents,req.comments, case req.status when 'NC' then '검토중' when 'C' then '승인' when 'N' then '미승인' end as status ,req.atd_seq,req.emp_code,e.name name,case A.STATUS when 'BW' then '출근 전' when 'IN' then '정상 출근' when 'OUT' then '외근' when 'LATE' then '지각' when 'ABS' then '결근'end as atd_status from atdchangereq req inner join employee e on e.code=req.emp_code inner join attendance A ON A.SEQ=REQ.ATD_SEQ order by seq desc
mapper.update: update atdchangereq set start_time=to_timestamp('${today} ${start_time}','YY-MM-DD HH24mi'), end_time=to_timestamp('${today} ${end_time}','YY-MM-DD HH24mi'),contents=#{contents},STATUS='NC',comments='' where atd_seq=#{atd_seq}
update attendance set status='ABS' where seq=#{seq}
